interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series)
Review Date: 2020/10/22
Store: MIZHSE
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'}
Review Text: I have their blue set so when I saw the links I knew I needed them and they do not disappoint! Easy application! You will need a Uv light to help cure and a base  and top coat. It also came with a bonus glitter pot as a gift!
Review Title: Love this brand
Rating: 5.0

reference_summary:
10pcs Baby Girl Elastic Multicolor Flower Headband Rhinestone Hair Band Susenstone®610 {'Age Range (Description)': 'Baby', 'Occasion': 'Wedding, Birthday', 'Material': 'Rhinestone', 'Fabric Type': 'elastic', 'Number of Items': '10', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Manufacturer recommended age': '0 - 5 months', 'UPC': '638823006215', 'Manufacturer': 'Susenstone®'} They're beautiful and look just like the picture! everything is solid on them! I can't wait to see our baby girl in them!! They're beautiful and look just like the picture MUSE & Co Dazzling Rhinestone Stick On Nails, White Nails with Glitter Nails and Rhinestones "French Sparkle", Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set 36pcs MUSENCO {'Color': 'White', 'Size': '36 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'French', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 4.33 x 0.79 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Not only are they beautiful but they stay!! I’ve been so nervous to try the new stick on nails trend but decided to go in and try these. I am so comfortable with them on! I’m not scared they’re going to pop of every 2 seconds. Especially with beauty shops being shut down on and off it’s an affordable and fun way to try out new stuff! I will say I used a UV lamp I already had after applying I’ll update when I try it without the UV lamp and as the days go by to see how they hold up. Obsessed!!!! Poly Nail Gel Kit, 7 Colors Nail Extension Gel with UV Lamp, Poly Extension Decoration Kit, Base Top Coat Set with Rhinestone, Nail Molds, Complete Nail Art Gel Kits for DIY Manicure, Pink Nude Series AIFAIFA {'Color': 'Pink', 'Brand': 'AIFAIFA', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Dimensions': '5.9 x 5.9 x 5.9 inches; 1.5 Pounds'} Neat little set. The only thing I didn’t like about it was that the nail polish bottles weren’t labeled. Kind of messed me up at first thinking the bottom coat was the top but once I figured it out I taped the caps up so I can tell.
EDIT*** they ARE labeled!!! I’m just blind!! Neat little set MUSE & Co Dazzling Swarovski Stick On Nails, Light Pink Nails Embellished with Swarovski Crystals "Elegant Princess" Luxurious Elegant Nails, Squoval Medium Length Nails Press On Nails for Women and Girls Fake Nail Set, 36pcs MUSENCO {'Color': 'Nude', 'Size': '36 Piece Set (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'MUSENCO', 'Style': 'Art Deco', 'Product Dimensions': '1.97 x 0.79 x 4.33 inches; 0.71 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'MUSENCO'} Got my first pair and had to get more! They’re beautiful and stick great!!!! Beautiful AOFLLU Hair Clips for Girls, 120 Pcs No Slip Metal Snap Hair Clips Barrettes for Girls Kids Women AOFLLU {'Brand': 'AOFLLU', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Child', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Occasion': "Christmas, Valentine's Day", 'Package Dimensions': '4.7 x 2.9 x 0.7 inches; 4.8 Ounces'} My daughter has very short hair and they don’t all fit up into her ponytail so we use these types of clips to pin up her fly aways. They have a strong hold and don’t fall out as easy as other brands we’ve tried! Plus the variety of colors is great so they can match her outfits. They were all accounted for as well! Highly recommend! Strong hold Pumice Stone for Feet, 2 in 1 Double Sided Hard Skin Callus Remover for Feet,Hands and Body, Exfoliator Pedicure File Block Callus Remover Scrubber (Pack of 4) KSang {'Brand': 'KSang', 'Material': 'Volcanic Stone', 'Is Electric': 'No', 'Item Form': 'Scrubber, Filer', 'Unit Count': '4.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '6 x 5.6 x 2.7 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '192242957393'} These work great. Since stay at home order I’ve invested in doing my own pedis and these are a must! They get the job done and the colors are a cute touch! Works great Glitter Poly Nail Gel Extensions Builder Gel UV/LED Soak Off Acrylic Fashion Gel Polish Set for Nails Beginner DIY Nail Art at Home 8 colors-15g (Pink series) MIZHSE {'Brand': 'MIZHSE', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '478.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Package Dimensions': '9.76 x 4.88 x 1.42 inches; 12.8 Ounces'} I have their blue set so when I saw the links I knew I needed them and they do not disappoint! Easy application! You will need a Uv light to help cure and a base and top coat. It also came with a bonus glitter pot as a gift! Love this brand
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Target Audience:** The user remains focused on stylish and functional products for babies, particularly girls, enhancing their appearance.

- **Product Type:** There is a growing interest in beauty products, specifically DIY nail art tools and accessories, alongside a continued affinity for baby accessories, particularly hair clips and bands. The recent purchase demonstrates a clear enthusiasm for nail care and personal grooming.

- **Occasions:** The user still seeks products for special events such as weddings and birthdays, using stylish offerings to create memorable experiences for their child.

- **Aesthetic Preferences:** They value beauty and visual appeal, with a pronounced appreciation for colorful, decorative items and shimmery finishes that enhance their personal style. This includes a new passion for nail products that reflect their dedication to aesthetics.

- **Quality Expectations:** The user maintains high standards for durability and functionality in their purchases, drawn to high-quality, non-toxic, and cruelty-free products that align with their values.

- **Emotional Connection:** Excited about how both baby products and personal beauty tools contribute to style and self-care, they emphasize strong familial bonds and nurturing instincts, viewing personal grooming as an extension of self-expression.

Overall, the user is increasingly exploring stylish, functional beauty accessories, particularly for nails, while continuing to value quality and elegance in products for both themselves and their child. Their delightful approach to aesthetics persists across all aspects of their life.
